name: Save MemberVault users to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new user is added to a product in MemberVault, Make will automatically add that user to your Google Sheets spreadsheet as a new row. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1JQjp-SD_ttV4fX3YSs5_gmKJ5tLzc5SFhKh9aLakTKU/edit?usp=sharing).
